casebody.data:
623 A.2d 184 ATTORNEY GRIEVANCE COMMISSION OF MARYLAND v. Melvin C. PAUL. Misc. (Subtitle BV) No. 14,

Sept. Term, 1993.

Court of Appeals of Maryland. April 21, 1993.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the Consent to Disbarment from the practice of law filed by Melvin C. Paul, in accordance with Maryland Rule BV12d2, and the written recommendation of Bar Counsel, it is this 21st day of April, 1993

ORDERED, by the Court of Appeals of Maryland, that Melvin C. Paul, be, and he is hereby, disbarred by consent from the further practice of law in the State of Maryland; and it is further

ORDERED that the Clerk of this Court shall strike the name of Melvin C. Paul, from the register of attorneys, and pursuant to Maryland Rule BV13, shall certify that fact to the Trustees of the Clients’ Security Trust Fund and the clerks of all judicial tribunals in the State.
